channel.title: Sample Size on Kamarul's website
channel.description: Recent content in Sample Size on Kamarul's website

item.title: Sample size webpages
item.description: There are very strong proponents for sample size calculation in research proposal. And also, there are various approaches to calculate sample size. For example, to calculate the sample size in a study that wants to estimate the prevalence to compare the mean difference between 2 treatments or groups to estimate the correlation between 2 numerical variables Previously, I showed and calculated for my clients/students but recently, I have changed my style.
